page.title: 20CLUBS
page.content: There are several club type activities in the area. For the children the Cubs, Scouts, Brownies & Guides are a popular form of entertainment. A Youth Club has been opened in the Village Hall where Games Evenings alternate on a weekly basis with Discos. Entertainment is provided at the Working Mens Club, there are various groups attached to the Churches & sports activities in the Village Hall. A Womens Institute meets regularly & Whist Drives are held. There are also Cricket, Football & Riding Clubs. Money raising is enthusiastically undertaken as was proved by the money raised for the Village Hall. This took the form of May Day Festivals, "Knockout" Sports Events, Pram Races, Auction Sales & the usual Bazaars & Jumble Sales.
